div.p: Viennese attorney, his law practice being located in the 8th district (Josefstadt) at Josefstädter Straße 43.

div.head: Glässner and the Schenkers
div.p: Dr. Glässner worked on behalf of Jeanette Schenker in her suit for separation from her husband, Emil Kornfeld, in the period 1913-19. Jeanette's sister Frieda Schiff married a Theodor Glässner: it is not known whether he may have been a relative of Max Glässner.
Correspondence between Glässner and Schenker is recorded in Schenker's diaries, but none of it is known to have survived.
